text: Dhanmandal railway station is a railway station on the East Coast Railway network in the state of Odisha, India. It serves Dhanmandal village. Its code is DNM. It has three platforms. Passenger, MEMU, Express trains halt at Dhanmandal railway station. ==Major Trains== * East Coast Express * Dhauli Express * Neelachal Express ==See also== * Jajpur district ==References== Category:Railway stations in Jajpur district Category:Khurda Road railway division
title: Dhanmandal railway station
